entry.dcterms:title: The Economic Determination of Hungarian Regions 1996-2000
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E88: The Economic Determination of Hungarian Regions 1996-2000. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Molnár, László
entry.dcterms:description: TSTAR data; the survey examines the condition of the economic spatial structure of Hungary at the end of the nineties based on aggregated settlement data; main topics: regional development, infrastructure, private sector, population incomes, unemployment, demographic data
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
land use planning
political institutions, public administration
economic conditions and indicators
transport, travel (and mobility)
censuses
income, property and savings
equality and inequality
administrative area
aggregate data
cross-section
No sampling; aggregated data file. The basic population is all of the settlements in Hungary.
Summary of statistical data.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: SPSS portable datafile
